definition: to shun/to avoid (sb)/to skirt/to evade (an issue)/to step back/to withdraw/to recuse (a judge etc)
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: For many years, he avoided lakes "ending."

sentences.english: More broadly, Alceste shuns all of mankind, of which he is also part.

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to declare to be untrue/to deny
to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
conflict/to conflict/clash of opposing forces/collision (of interests)/contention
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
